channel.title: Version 7.0 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 7.0.1 (2024-10-15) Fixes [bug] search: search plank not generated wit' renderer.unsafe #929 7.0.0 (2024-10-13) Enhancements [feature][change] logo: move Relearrrn logo t' exampleSite #924 [feature][change] math: adhere t' Hugoâ€™s default config params #923 [feature][change] theme: replace font #922 [feature][break'n] theme: reduce build time #685 Fixes [bug] theme: remove duplicate path warning #926 Maintenance [task] theme: remove author deprecat'n warning #919 [task] theme: remove deprecat'n war'n fer usage o' .Sites.First #912 [task][break'n] theme: restructure code #891 [task][break'n] search: improve generat'n o' dedicated search plank #888 [task] theme: remove warning fer usage o' .Site.IsMultiLingual #877 [task][break'n] roadmap: upcom'n major changes fer 7.0.0 #715
